item.title: Analysis of residuals
item.description: Introduction conda install statsmodels seaborn Plotting residuals Regression assumptions Linearity and equal variance Normality Interpreting residuals Common issues Heteroscedasticity Identify heteroscedasticity Breusch-Pagan Lagrange Multiplier test Using StatsModels we have statsmodels.stats.diagnostic.het_breuschpagan Non-linearity Outliers Long Y-axis datapoints X-axis unbalanced
